title: Satellite sees 40-year-old iceberg melt, turn blue | Space photo of the day for January 12, 2025
description: Iceberg A23-A has been around since the Chernobyl explosion and Space Shuttle Challenger accident...but perhaps not for much longer.
content: Iceberg A23-A has been around since the Chernobyl explosion and Space Shuttle Challenger accident...but perhaps not for much longer.
